statements: UPDATE foot_traffic_monitoring SET location = 'Entrance', customer_behavior = 'Browsing' WHERE id = 101;

UPDATE foot_traffic_monitoring SET customer_behavior = 'Loyal' WHERE customer_id = 123 AND location = 'Entrance'
UPDATE foot_traffic_monitoring SET sensor_id = 5, time_stamp = '2022-01-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = 7
UPDATE store_foot_traffic SET foot_traffic_count = 100 WHERE store_id = 1 AND sensor_id = 3;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Exited' WHERE customer_id = 10 AND store_id = 2;
UPDATE store_foot_traffic SET foot_traffic_count = foot_traffic_count + 10 WHERE store_id = 1 AND sensor_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET behavior_type = 'Exited' WHERE customer_id = 1002 AND store_id = 1

UPDATE foot_traffic_data SET foot_traffic_count = foot_traffic_count + 5 WHERE sensor_id = 101 AND store_id = 201 AND timestamp >= '2021-10-01';
